message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $13,500 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,000 and $12,000. Can we try $10,500?
